name: Andrew's Crazy Adventure
description:
Hi,

My name is Isabelle and I have been working with my classmates to make our first real game. We are from Södertörns University  in Stockholm studying game design, Group SUPH-01.  

This project was 1 month long . Feel free to try our first game and let us know what you think.

There is a few bugs were the spiders sometimes can get stuck but for the most part they are moving just fine. (Don't forget that this is our first game ;) )

You are playing as Andrew who needs to collect the cogwheels to get to the next level. You have 3 power-ups in the game that makes you go faster, get an extra life and one that makes you immortal for some seconds. 

Please enjoy and tell us what you think! 

Team:

Oskar - Graphics

Tim - Graphics

Bo - Graphics

Ben - Design

Alexander - Programming

Isabelle - Design and programming
